rows.label: qst100606_msg0001
rows.name: *huff*... *huff*...!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0032
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Bahn-sama will! Say! Nothing!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0002
rows.name: How should I ask?

rows.label: qst100606_msg0003
rows.name: Admonish him

rows.label: qst100606_msg0004
rows.name: Flatter him

rows.label: qst100606_msg0005
rows.name: Threaten him

rows.label: qst100606_msg0006
rows.name: *huff*... Confess all my sins?

rows.label: qst100606_msg0011
rows.name:
I have no idea what
you're talking about!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0007
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I am in the very act of
atoning for my sins!!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0008
rows.name:
*huff*... I look cool
turning the pulley?

rows.label: qst100606_msg0009
rows.name: Heh heh! You finally understand, mo?

rows.label: qst100606_msg0010
rows.name:
This pulley is Bahn-sama's pride and
joy! Turning it myself makes me
appreciate its wonder even more! Hahaha!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0030
rows.name:
You'll make me stop turning the
pulley? What do you mean?!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0033
rows.name:
Stop the pulley and give me
another punishment?! Getting
fluffed by muscular men?!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0041
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]No! No, mo!! Ahhhh!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0034
rows.name:
And just when I was starting to
enjoy turning it a little...

rows.label: qst100606_msg0012
rows.name:
*huff*... The pulley turns honestly,
but Bahn-sama is not honest?!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0027
rows.name:
I don't need you to tell me that
Bahn-sama is twisted! I know that!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0028
rows.name:
*huff* *huff* *huff*... This is
tiring, mo! Don't bother me!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0029
rows.name:
*huff*... If I tell you how to
open the treasure chest, I'll
be more sincere and cool?

rows.label: qst100606_msg0013
rows.name:
The word sincere doesn't exist
in Bahn-sama's head, that's
why... I ended up like this...

rows.label: qst100606_msg0031
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Mohah! *cough* *cough*...
Don't bother me!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0014
rows.name:
*huff*...? What do you mean I
won't be able to turn it soon?!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0015
rows.name:
If I don't tell you how to
open the treasure chest,
you'll dismantle this pulley?!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0016
rows.name:
...Even though it's a
punishment, I was actually
starting to enjoy it a bit!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0019
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I don't want to stop! I'll tell
you about the treasure chest,
so please let me turn it!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0018
rows.name:
Fit the Ether Bottle, the Filament
Globe, and the Key-Shaped Lever into
the treasure chest, and it'll open!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0017
rows.name:
I told you, so you have to
protect the existence of
this pulley! *huff*...

rows.label: qst100606_msg0020
rows.name:
*huff*... *huff*... If I
confess all my sins, I can
keep turning the pulley?

rows.label: qst100606_msg0036
rows.name: Mmm... It's frustrating, but... *huff*!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0037
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I don't want to stop! I'll tell
you about the treasure chest,
so please let me turn it!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0039
rows.name:
Fit the Ether Bottle, the Filament
Globe, and the Key-Shaped Lever into
the treasure chest, and it'll open!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0038
rows.name:
I told you, so don't give me
another punishment, let me keep
turning this one! *huff*...

rows.label: qst100606_msg0021
rows.name:
*huff*... *huff*... Like the
pulley that turns honestly,
Bahn-sama should be honest too?

rows.label: qst100606_msg0040
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]If Bahn-sama became honest, he
wouldn't be Bahn-sama anymore!!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0042
rows.name:
For the sake of being myself...
I'll even endure the fluffing
of muscular men!! Hmph!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0022
rows.name:
After being fluffed by muscular
men, I have to turn the pulley while
being fluffed by muscular men?!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0023
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]This pulley is for one
person!! If those heavy
guys get on, it'll break!!

rows.label: qst100606_msg0024
rows.name:
I have nothing to say to people
who don't care about the
pulley...! *cough*! *cough*!
